description: Brighton have signed midfielder Nadine Noordam from Ajax on a permanent transfer on deadline day.
title: Nadine Noordam: Brighton sign Ajax midfielder on permanent deal
title_page: Nadine Noordam: Brighton sign Ajax midfielder on permanent deal - BBC Sport
maintext:
Brighton have signed midfielder Nadine Noordam from Ajax on a permanent transfer.
The 26-year-old, who was under contract with Ajax until June, completed the move on deadline day.
She made 105 appearances for the Dutch club in all competitions, scoring 18 goals and represented her country from under-15 to under-23 age groups.
"We're really pleased to have Nadine at Brighton," said manager Dario Vidosic.
"She is a versatile and high-energy central midfielder who can create and score goals.
"She's got a lot of domestic experience in the Netherlands and in the Champions League, so has played at the highest level in club football.
"Nadine is keen to play in the WSL, and we think she can have a big impact for us in the short and long-term.
"I'm looking forward to seeing her in a Brighton shirt and to being part of our squad."
